ygData.subject: Re: Lvl 12 pet spell question
ygData.msgSnippet: personally, ive never seen the reason people are so worried about it either. if the pet is weak, i usually just took that fact into account rather than killing
ygData.messageBody:
personally, ive never seen the reason people are so worried about it either.
if the pet is weak, i usually just took that fact into account rather than
killing the pet and recasting. its better to get a little use out of those
two bone chips than none =)

belphenor



>
>The level on a pet rarely matters as they seem to hit the mob anyway. My
>level 40 necro pet ( 49th spell ) still manages to hit mobs 9 to even 15
>levels over him so I don't think you need to worry about it to much.
>
>Naeeldar
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: TkAdam@... <TkAdam@...>
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Date: Friday, February 11, 2000 10:52 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Lvl 12 pet spell question
>
>
> >From: TkAdam@...
> >
> >In a message dated 2/11/00 10:50:28 AM Eastern Standard Time,
> >nrusso@... writes:
> >
> >> What is the deal with the lvl 12 pet spell? I have a necro guide (from
> >> Allakhazam's) that says the lvl 12 pet spell is supposed to summon a
>pet
> >> from lvl 11 - 13. I've lost count of how many times I cast that spell
>at
> >> lvl 12 and I was NEVER able to get anything other than a blue-conning
>pet!
> >>
> >> Have you all had the same experience, or have I not sacrificed the
>right
> >> kind of chicken to the Verant gods?
> >>
> >> Mujahid 13 Necromancer Solusek Ro
> >
> >Allakazam's is wrong...
> >
> >at 12 you get an 8-12 pet, not 11-13 :(
> >At some point the scale gets even worse...
> >
> >The rational is the the pet is an NPC and the levels do not scale the
>same
> >way...
